meanings.definition: Relating to a class of organic compounds that do not contain a ring of atoms.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the alicyclic compound in the lab.
meanings.sent2: The alicyclic molecule had a unique structure.
meanings.sent3: The alicyclic chemical walked into a bar, but it couldn't find a ring to sit on.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were alicyclic, flowing freely without any constraints.
meanings.sent5: The alicyclic nature of the substance made it stand out in the experiment.

meanings.definition: A compound that is not cyclic in structure.
meanings.sent1: The researcher synthesized an alicyclic in the laboratory.
meanings.sent2: An alicyclic is different from a cyclic compound.
meanings.sent3: The alicyclic joked with the cyclic compound about not being in a loop.
meanings.sent4: His mind was like an alicyclic, always moving forward in a straight line.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of the alicyclic was in its simplicity and linearity.
